backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a dental appointment booking system with role-based access control (admin/user), appointment management, user profiles, blob storage, and various dental service types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a requirement to change admin login credentials to username 'USER' and password 'PASS', affecting the useAdminAuth.ts file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the Annaya Dental Care application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including color tokens for UI elements and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Annaya Dental Care application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, booking, services, service details, and admin pages, wrapped with QueryClient and Toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/AdminLoginForm.t: Admin login form component using react-hook-form for validation, calling useAdminAuth hook to validate credentials and display error messages on failed authentication.
Appointment booking form with date picker, service selection, connection monitoring with 30-second timeout detection, and integration with backend actor for submitting appointments.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Displays contact information (location, phone, email, hours) in a card layout with icons and includes a WhatsApp button. Uses scroll animations for fade-in effects and includes an embedded map section.
frontend/src/components/DoctorsSection.t: Renders a grid of three doctor profile cards with avatars, names, and specializations. Each card uses scroll-triggered slide-up animations with staggered delays.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with three columns showing clinic branding, contact details, and quick links. Includes copyright notice and attribution to caffeine.ai with dynamic year and hostname.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with navigation menu supporting both route navigation and smooth scrolling to page sections. Includes mobile menu toggle, active section tracking, and conditional admin logout button.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with dual-card layout featuring a reception area image with CTA buttons and a promotional banner with sky blue gradient. Includes booking and contact action buttons with animations.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps pages with Header and Footer, using Outlet for nested route rendering in a flex column structure.
Displays six dental service cards in a grid with icons, images, descriptions, and action buttons. Each card has hover effects and scroll-triggered slide-up animations with staggered delays.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Displays patient testimonials in an auto-rotating carousel with star ratings, includes a before/after treatment image showcase, and pauses autoplay on hover.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsSecti: Renders a "Why Choose Us" section with four feature cards (expert doctors, modern technology, emergency care, affordable pricing) and a photo gallery of clinic facilities, using scroll animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating anonymous or authenticated actors based on Internet Identity, and initializes access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Provides admin authentication state management using sessionStorage, with login/logout functions that validate against hardcoded credentials and extensive console logging for debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing AuthClient creation, login flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching appointments (useGetAllAppointments and useAllAppointments) with detailed logging, requiring both actor and identity to be available before executing queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Custom hook that uses IntersectionObserver to detect when elements enter the viewport, respecting reduced motion preferences and supporting configurable threshold, trigger-once behavior, and root margins.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, and includes keyframe animations for UI transitions (fade-in, slide-up, pulse, etc.).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays all appointments in a filterable/sortable table, handles Internet Identity authentication, admin authorization, and includes profile setup for first-time admin users.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Appointment booking page that displays a header with back navigation and renders the AppointmentForm component for scheduling dental visits.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that composes multiple sections including hero, services, why choose us, doctors, testimonials, and contact sections.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Detailed service information page that displays comprehensive descriptions, procedures, benefits, and booking options for individual dental services using dynamic routing parameters.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services overview page that displays a grid of all available dental services with cards showing icons, descriptions, durations, and links to detailed service pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including color schemes using OKLCH format, typography, container queries, animations, custom shadows, and keyframes for accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting an admin authentication system with hardcoded USER/PASS credentials and appointment management dashboard, including existing features and pending feature requests.
